normalised: Arre bhai, ehi nutan building ta bahut bada heba! Kahuchanti ki eha praye duei shata futa ucha heba. Mu asa karuchi ki semane paryapta cement byabahar karithibe, jani paruchu ta? Sesha thara, semane kichhi kilogram bachaeithile ebang deewal ta eka thara pari phati gala. Ebang pancha shata square futa flat? Satare? Mora chappal taa' tharu bada! Jaha bi hau, sunichi ki semane das millimeter steel rod byabahar karuchanti, ta'hele anguli aada kari rahantu etaa au eka leaning tower of Pisa na banu.
